Text: Ford FSeriesDear Kevin Hyatt Thankyou for inquiring with Joe Myers Ford about our Ford FSeries I am excited to inform you that I do have the Ford FSeries you are looking for in stock and it is available for internet sale I can not promise that this unit will be here long so I invite you to come and take your new vehicle for a spin To set up a time or for any reason please contact me My name is Dustin Raiford Internet Sales at Joe Myers Ford I can be reached at and also through our web site I want to give you my personal guarantee that I will go out of my way to make you a happy satisfied consumer That means making this a hasslefree buying experience Joe Myers Ford is like having a dealer in the family Dustin Raiford Internet Sales Fax
